keyword: how many calories in a bowl of cereal
title: How Many Calories in a Bowl of Cereal?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a bowl of cereal, including a typical serving with milk, full nutrition breakdown, and easy tweaks for different options.
h1: How Many Calories in a Bowl of Cereal?
assumptions: 30 g cornflakes (dry) with 240 ml skim milk; no added sugar or toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by cereal type, brand, milk fat content, portion size, and additions. Check labels for accuracy.

quick_answer.text: A standard bowl of cornflakes with skim milk contains about 190 kcal and 10 g protein.

label_note: Values align with Nutrition Facts labels for straightforward comparison.

tweaks.label: Use whole milk instead of skim

faqs.q: How many calories in a bowl of cereal with milk?
faqs.a: About 190 kcal for 30 g cornflakes with 240 ml skim milk.

faqs.q: Does the type of cereal affect calories?
faqs.a: Yesâ€”sugary cereals can add 50+ kcal per bowl compared to plain ones.

faqs.q: How much protein in a bowl of cereal?
faqs.a: Roughly 10 g, mostly from the milk; cereal alone provides about 2 g.

faqs.q: Are there carbs in a bowl of cereal?
faqs.a: Yes, around 36 g total, with most from the cereal and milk sugars.

faqs.q: How to reduce calories in cereal?
faqs.a: Use low-fat milk, smaller portions, or opt for high-fiber, low-sugar varieties.
